General.Name: JA Solar Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: JA Solar Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of silicon wafers, solar cells, and solar cell components primarily in China. The company is also involved in the development, construction, and operation of solar photovoltaic power plants. It offers silicon rods, and photovoltaic cells and modules. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Jinglong Industry Park, Jinglong Street, Xingtai, China, 055550
